channel.title: Error when i try to compile
channel.description:
okay, i have JDK 6 update 2 that i just installed, i've made a compiler (looked at a tutorial), but when i try to compile i get this error:
[code]javac: file not found: *.java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i've tryed changing the enviroment variables, and i've looked for other topics that might help, i've also reinstalled JDK about 3 times. Can anyone help?
thanks.

item.title: Error when i try to compile
item.dc:creator: @unkn0w3n unkn0w3n
item.description:
@unkn0w3n wrote:

if you mean how i made the compiler:

@ECHO OFF title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
